question.question: Which of the following is a characteristic feature of a superficial basal cell carcinoma?
question.option_a: A translucent nodule covered with telangiectasias
question.option_b: A well-limited erythematosquamous plaque with a pearly border
question.option_c: A dark, pigmented lesion with irregular borders
question.option_d: A raised, shiny, pearly nodule with visible blood vessels
